## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G18440](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G18440)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ALMT9, AtALMT9</u>
- **Gene Name:** aluminum-activated malate transporter 9, aluminum-activated malate transporter 9
- **Description:**   aluminum-activated malate transporter 9;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_090362]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;no visible phenotype although the isolated leaf mesophyll protoplasts contain 20% less malate.
